text: The Dulgalakh (; , Dulğalaax) is a river in Yakutia, the left, western source river of the Yana. Its length is and its basin size . ==Course== The Dulgalakh rises on the northern slopes of Verkhoyansk Range. It flows through Kobyaysky and Verkhoyansky districts. Above Verkhoyansk it merges with the Sartang forming the Yana.Дулгалах — статья из Большой советской энциклопедии. title: Dulgalakh
